name: Sepia Daisy vase
description: Miniature vase, little more than 4 cm wide, for displaying daises or similar size flowers and small cuttings from garden plants. A tiny amount of water keeps the flower fresh for days. This styles incorporates a floral image that seemingly melts into the glaze.

name: Upright blue Daisy vase
description: Miniature vase, 4 cm wide, for displaying daises or similar size flowers and small cuttings from garden plants. A tiny amount of water keeps the flower fresh for days. This style keeps the flower more upright.

name: Delft Daisy vase
description:
Miniature vase for daises or similar size flowers. Beautifully displays garden flowers or equally exploring florists can throw up ideas. 
the vase is under 5 cm in diameter and needs just a drop of water to keep 
the flower fresh. These make wonderful and unusual gifts and there are offers on other pages for multiple buys and of course postage is free.
